'''Name:''' Maitraya Kanta Bhattacharyya

'''Nationality:''' Indian

'''Education:''' High school student

== Aims: ==
1. To provide complete Bengali localisation for Ubuntu.

2. To develop wallpapers, themes and artworks for Ubuntu.

3. To contribute to the Ubuntu documentation team.

== Have done ==
1. Started translating Ubuntu into Bengali and contribute regularly.

2. Copied more than 20 cds to be distributed to friends for spreading the word of Ubuntu.

3. Started a blog http://openfreedom.wordpress.com to promote open source: particularly Ubuntu.

4. Currently, I am trying to redesign the Ubuntu-India Community website with the help of other enthusiastic members of the community.
== Future plans ==
1. To publish an open sourced ebook aimed at providing detailed command line instructions.

2. To create local Ubuntu clubs in West Bengal,India for development and promotion of Ubuntu.
